flawed_nl_solution:
Wallace already has 20 bags of jerky, so he needs to make 60 - 20 = <<60-20=50>>50 bags more.
He can make 10 bags per day, so he needs 50 / 10 = 5 days to fulfill the customer's order.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
